languages.text: "Проклятье! Если бы хоть один ткач Кровавой паутины был жив... Он бы не мучился. А я... не могу".
"Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."
languages.original_text: "Проклятье! Если бы хоть один ткач Кровавой паутины был жив... Он бы не мучился. А я... не могу".

traits.locale_text: "Damn it! If just one Bloodspun Web weaver was still alive... he wouldn't be in such pain. And I... I can't."
"Damn it! If just one Bloodspun Web weaver was still alive... he wouldn't be in such pain. And I... I can't."
"Damn it! If the Bloodspun weavers were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."
"Damn it! If the Bloodspun weavers were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."
"Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."
"Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."

languages.text: « Bon sang ! Si les tisseurs étaient encore en vie, ils mettraient un terme à ses souffrances. Mais moi... Moi, je ne peux pas. »
languages.original_text: "Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."

traits.locale_text: « Bon sang ! Si les tisseurs étaient encore en vie, ils mettraient un terme à ses souffrances. Mais moi... Moi, je ne peux pas. »

languages.text: «¡Maldita sea! Si los tejedores siguieran vivos, acabarían con su sufrimiento. Pero yo no... no puedo».
languages.original_text: "Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."

traits.locale_text: «¡Maldita sea! Si los tejedores siguieran vivos, acabarían con su sufrimiento. Pero yo no... no puedo».

languages.text: “真该死！要是那些织网者还活着，他们就可以结束他的痛苦了，可我……我做不到。”
languages.original_text: "Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."

traits.locale_text: “真该死！要是那些织网者还活着，他们就可以结束他的痛苦了，可我……我做不到。”

languages.text: 「くそが！紡績工がまだ生きていれば、彼の苦しみは終わるだろう。でも…私にはできない」
languages.original_text: "Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."

traits.locale_text: 「くそが！ブラッドスパン・ウィーバーがまだ生きていれば、彼の苦しみは終わるだろう。でも…私にはできない」

languages.text: "Verdammt! Würden die Spinner noch leben, würden sie seinem Leid ein Ende setzen. Aber ich ... Ich kann nicht."
languages.original_text: "Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."

traits.locale_text: "Verdammt! Würden die Spinner noch leben, würden sie seinem Leid ein Ende setzen. Aber ich ... Ich kann nicht."

languages.text: "Kahretsin! Dokurlar hâlâ hayatta olsalardı çektiği acıya bir son verirlerdi. Ama ben... Yapamam."
languages.original_text: "Damn it! If the spinners were still alive, they would end his suffering. But I... I can't."
